title: Medical Practical Competency Enhancement: MOOC-Based Language Learning Design Strategy Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational digital literacy and language learning experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and explain the five core domains utilized in MOOC design: learning, activities, resources, interaction, and assessment.
Learners can compare and evaluate differences in MOOC design according to platform characteristics through VR simulations.
Learners can design and pilot-test MOOC activities and interaction strategies suitable for language education.
Learners can improve design proposals by exchanging peer feedback using formative assessment tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
